column1: What players have/had the most unfortunate names in NBA history? (Ã  la Jay Scrubb)

[Sam Vecenie] The Clippers gave us 55 shots from rookies Daniel Oturu and Jay Scrubb in the final two games against tanking Rockets and Thunder teams just so they could play the Mavericks in Round One.
NBA example of Nominative determinism: The Clippers 15th man is named Jay Scrubb
Jay Scrubb with the four-point play to bring his point total to 20. He also has 8 rebounds.
Jay Scrubb hits the step-back three-pointer. Scores 6 of the Clippers' first 10 points:

Top 15 in charges drawn per game last season 1- Udonis Haslem (1.00) 2- Kemba Walker (0.51) 3- Henry Ellenson (0.50) 4- Jay Scrubb (0.50) 5- Blake Griffin (0.48) 6- Kyle Lowry (0.43) 7- Derrick White (0.39) 8- Victor Oladipo (0.36) 9- Montrezl Harrell (0.32) 10- Moritz Wagner (0.31)
The Clippers now have 10 players 25 or younger: Terance Mann, Luke Kennard, Ivica Zubac, Amir Coffey, Justise Winslow, Harry Giles, Jay Scrubb, Keon Johnson,Jason Preston and Brandon Boston Jr.
